scripts.deploy-backend: sls deploy && sls info -v | grep 'ServiceEndpoint' | sed 's,ServiceEndpoint: ,REACT_APP_ENDPOINT=,g' > frontend/.env
scripts.build-client: cd frontend; npm run build; cd ../
scripts.deploy-client: npm run build-client && sls client deploy --no-confirm
scripts.deploy-all: npm run deploy-backend && npm run deploy-client
